xwikidoc.name: AWMChartMacro
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: $services.localization.render("awm.chartmacro.title")

contentDescription.name: contentDescription
contentDescription.prettyName: Content description (Not applicable for "No content" type)

property.code:
{{velocity}} #** * Get the name of the Property that should be used for a given column. * NOTE the resulting $tableName is safe to use inside SQL queries *# #macro(chartmacro_getTableName $propClassName $colname) #chartmacro_getPropertyClassAndType($propClassName $colname) #set($tableAlias = "prop") #set($propAlias = "prop.value") #if($propType == 'NumberClass') #set($numberType = $propClass.get($colname).getProperty('numberType').getValue()) #if($numberType == 'integer') #set($tableName = 'IntegerProperty') #elseif($numberType == 'float') #set($tableName = 'FloatProperty') #elseif($numberType == 'double') #set($tableName = 'DoubleProperty') #else #set($tableName = 'LongProperty') #end #elseif($propType == 'BooleanClass') #set($tableName = 'IntegerProperty') #elseif($propType == 'DateClass') #set($tableName = 'DateProperty') #elseif($propType == 'TextAreaClass' || $propType == 'UsersClass' || $propType == 'GroupsClass') #set($tableName = 'LargeStringProperty') #elseif($propType == 'StaticListClass' || $propType == 'DBListClass' || $propType == 'DBTreeListClass﻿' || $propType == 'PageClass') #set($fmultiSelect = $propClass.get($propFinalSubFieldName).getProperty('multiSelect').getValue()) #set($frelationalStorage = $propClass.get($propFinalSubFieldName).getProperty('relationalStorage').getValue()) #if($fmultiSelect == 1) #if($frelationalStorage == 1) #set($tableName = 'DBStringListProperty') #set($tableAlias = "prop join prop.list list") #set($propAlias = "list") #else #set($tableName = 'StringListProperty') #end #else #set($tableName = 'StringProperty') #end #else #set($tableName = 'StringProperty') #end #end
#** * Get the property class and type for a given column. *# #macro(chartmacro_getPropertyClassAndType $propClassName $colname) #set($propFinalClassName = $propClassName) #set($propFinalName = $colname) #set($propFinalSubFieldName = $colname) #if($propClassName != '') #set($propClass = $xwiki.getDocument($propClassName).getxWikiClass()) #else #set($propClass = $class) #end #set($propType = '') #if($propClass.getPropertyNames().contains($colname)) #set($propType = "$!{propClass.get($colname).type}") #end ## if we cannot find the field, maybe it's a linked field #if($propType == '') #set($propFinalName = $colname.replaceAll("(.*?)_.*",'$1')) #set($propFinalSubFieldName = $colname.replaceAll(".*?_(.*)",'$1')) #set($field = $propClass.get($propFinalName)) #set($fieldType = $field.type) #if($fieldType.contains("DBListClass")) #set($multiSelect = $field.getPropertyClass().get("multiSelect").getValue()) #if($multiSelect == 1) #set($relationalStorage = $field.getPropertyClass().get("relationalStorage").getValue()) #end #set($sql = $field.getPropertyClass().get("sql").getValue()) #set($propFinalClassName = $sql.replaceAll(".*[.]className.*?=.*?'(.*?)'.*",'$1')) #set($propClass = $xwiki.getDocument($propFinalClassName).getxWikiClass()) #if($propClass.getPropertyNames().contains($propFinalSubFieldName)) #set($propType = "$!{propClass.get($propFinalSubFieldName).type}") #end #end #end #end #if($xcontext.macro.params.app) #set($app = $xcontext.macro.params.app) #else #set($app = "") #end #set($className = $xcontext.macro.params.className) #if(!$className || $className=="") #set($appDoc = $xwiki.getDocument("${app}.WebHome")) #set($className = $appDoc.getValue("class")) #end #if($xcontext.macro.params.category) #set($category = $xcontext.macro.params.category) #else #set($category = "status") #end #if($xcontext.macro.params.title && $xcontext.macro.params.title!="") #set($chartTitle = $xcontext.macro.params.title) #else #set($chartTitle = "") #end #set($aggProp = "count(distinct doc.fullName)") #set($aggWhere = "") #if($xcontext.macro.params.aggregate && $xcontext.macro.params.aggregate!="") #set($aggregate = $xcontext.macro.params.aggregate) #if($aggregate.startsWith("doc.") || $aggregate.startsWith("distinct doc.")) #if($xcontext.macro.params.aggregateFunction && $xcontext.macro.params.aggregateFunction!="") #set($aggProp = "${xcontext.macro.params.aggregateFunction}(${aggregate})") #else #set($aggProp = "count(${aggregate})") #end #else #chartmacro_getTableName($className $aggregate) #set($aggTableName = ",${tableName} as aggprop") #set($aggWhere = "and obj.id=aggprop.id.id and aggprop.id.name='${aggregate}'") #if($xcontext.macro.params.aggregateFunction && $xcontext.macro.params.aggregateFunction!="") #set($aggProp = "${xcontext.macro.params.aggregateFunction}(aggprop.value)") #else #set($aggProp = "sum(aggprop.value)") #end #end #end #set($queryParams = []) #set($discard = $queryParams.add($className)) #if($category.startsWith("doc.")) #set($propAlias = $category) #set($tableName = "") #set($colWhere = "") #set($categoryPrettyName = $category) #else #chartmacro_getTableName($className $category) #if($className != $propFinalClassName) ## in this case we have a linked field #if($relationalStorage == 1) #set($tableName = ", BaseObject as obj2, DBStringListProperty as fieldprop join fieldprop.list list2, ${tableName} as ${tableAlias}") #set($colWhere = "and obj.id=fieldprop.id.id and fieldprop.id.name=? and list2=obj2.name and obj2.className=? and obj2.id=prop.id.id and prop.id.name=?") #else #set($tableName = ", BaseObject as obj2, StringProperty as fieldprop, ${tableName} as ${tableAlias}") #set($colWhere = "and obj.id=fieldprop.id.id and fieldprop.id.name='${propFinalName}' and fieldprop.value=obj2.name and obj2.className='${propFinalClassName}' and obj2.id=prop.id.id and prop.id.name='${propFinalSubFieldName}'") #end ##set($discard = $queryParams.add($propFinalName)) ##set($discard = $queryParams.add($propFinalClassName)) ##set($discard = $queryParams.add($propFinalSubFieldName)) #else #set($tableName = ",${tableName} as ${tableAlias}") #set($colWhere = "and obj.id=prop.id.id and prop.id.name=?") #set($discard = $queryParams.add($category)) #end #set($categoryPrettyName = $xwiki.getDocument($propFinalClassName).getxWikiClass().get($propFinalSubFieldName).getPrettyName()) #end #if($xcontext.macro.params.columnTitle && $xcontext.macro.params.columnTitle!="") #set($categoryPrettyName = $xcontext.macro.params.columnTitle) #end #if($xcontext.macro.params.function && $xcontext.macro.params.function!="") #set($function = $xcontext.macro.params.function) #if($function.contains("(")) #set($propAlias = $function) #else #set($propAlias = "${function}(${propAlias})") #end #end #if($xcontext.macro.params.orderDirection && $xcontext.macro.params.orderDirection=="asc") #set($orderdir = "asc") #else #set($orderdir = "desc") #end #if(!$xcontext.macro.params.orderColumn || $xcontext.macro.params.orderColumn!=$xcontext.macro.params.category) #set($order = "order by 2 ${orderdir}") #else #set($order = "order by 1 ${orderdir}") #end #set($nb = 0) #if($xcontext.macro.params.nb) #set($nb = $util.parseInt($xcontext.macro.params.nb)) #end #set($havingHQL = "") #if($xcontext.macro.params.havingHQL && $xcontext.macro.params.havingHQL!="") #set($havingHQL = "having ${xcontext.macro.params.havingHQL}") #end #set($query = "select $propAlias , ${aggProp} from XWikiDocument as doc, BaseObject as obj $!{tableName} $!{aggTableName} $!{xcontext.macro.params.fromHQL} where doc.fullName=obj.name and obj.className=? $!{colWhere} $!{aggWhere} $!{xcontext.macro.params.whereHQL} group by ${propAlias} ${havingHQL} ${order}") #if($request.debug) $services.localization.render("awm.chartmacro.query"): {{{ ${query} ${queryParams} }}} #end #set($list = []) #try() #set($list = $xwiki.search($query, $nb, 0, $queryParams)) #end #if($exception) $services.localization.render("awm.chartmacro.exception"): {{{ $exception }}} #end #if($request.debug) $services.localization.render("awm.chartmacro.data"): $list #end #if($list && $list.size()>0) #if($xcontext.macro.params.aggregateTitle&&$xcontext.macro.params.aggregateTitle!="") #set($countPrettyName = $xcontext.macro.params.aggregateTitle) #else #set($countPrettyName = $services.localization.render("awm.chartmacro.number")) #end #set($nblines = $list.size()) #set($nblines = $nblines + 1) #set($useRow = true) #set($showTable = true) #set($showChart = true) #if($xcontext.macro.params.table&&$xcontext.macro.params.table==0) #set($useRow = false) #set($showTable = false) #end #if($xcontext.macro.params.chart&&$xcontext.macro.params.chart==0) #set($showChart = false) #set($useRow = false) #end #if($xcontext.macro.params.useRow&&$xcontext.macro.params.useRow==0) #set($useRow = false) #end #if($useRow) (% class="row" %) ((( #end #if($showChart) #if($xcontext.macro.params.colors && $context.macro.params.colors!="") #set($colors = "colors:${xcontext.macro.params.colors};") #end #set($chartString = "chart type='${xcontext.macro.params.type}' source='inline' params='range:B2-B${nblines};series:columns;$!{colors}${xcontext.macro.params.addParams}' title='${chartTitle}' width='${xcontext.macro.params.width}' height='${xcontext.macro.params.height}'") #if($request.debug) $services.localization.render("awm.chartmacro.chart"): {{{ $chartString }}} #end (% class="${xcontext.macro.params.chartClasses}" %) ((( {{${chartString}}} |= ${categoryPrettyName} |= ${countPrettyName} #foreach($item in $list) #set($value = $item.get(0)) #set($number = $item.get(1)) #if(!$number) #set($number = 0) #end #if($value.contains(".")) #set($valueDoc = $xwiki.getDocument($value)) #if(!$valueDoc.isNew() && $valueDoc.getTitle()!="") #set($value = $valueDoc.getTitle()) #end #end #if(!$value || $value.trim()=="") #set($value = $services.localization.render("awm.chartmacro.novalue")) #end | $!value | $number #end {{/chart}} ))) #end #if($showTable) (% class="${xcontext.macro.params.tableClasses}" %) ((( |= ${categoryPrettyName} |= ${countPrettyName} #foreach($item in $list) #set($value = $item.get(0)) #set($number = $item.get(1)) #if(!$number) #set($number = 0) #end #if($value.contains(".")) #set($valueDoc = $xwiki.getDocument($value)) #if(!$valueDoc.isNew() && $valueDoc.getTitle()!="") #set($value = $valueDoc.getTitle()) #end #end #if(!$value || $value.trim()=="") #set($value = $services.localization.render("awm.chartmacro.novalue")) #end | $!value | $number #end ))) #end #if($useRow) ))) #end #else $services.localization.render("awm.chartmacro.nodata") #end {{/velocity}}

property.description: Chart for AppWithinMinutes applications
AWM Application
Alternative className instead of the Application Name
Show Table
Chart Type
Width of the Chart
Height of the Chart
additional Params added to the chart params
Title of the Chart
HQL to add to the from part of the HQL Query
HQL to add to the where part of the HQL Query
Colors for the Chart
CSS classes to add to the chart div
CSS classes to add to the table div
Add a row bootstrap element
Function to use on the category field
Aggregate Field to use
Aggregate Function to use instead of count(*)
Column to sort the results on. The default is the first aggregated column
Direction to sort on (asc / desc)
Title to use for the group column
Title to use for the aggregate column
Field on which the counting is made
Maximum number of items to retrieve from query
Group items representing less than a certain percentage of total
HQL to add to the having part of the HQL Query
